column1: It's become an annual tradition to share my family’s favorite pecan pie recipe this time of year. Here it is in case you're looking for a last-minute Thanksgiving recipe.  It's easy to make & won first place at the Naglee Park July 4th Bake-Off! https://t.co/0afJ11OfmV

Multiple emails between @HHSGov & @ICEGov show the Administration had no plan to reunify separated parents with their children.  Sadly scores of children remain separated & will likely never be reunited with their parents. https://t.co/WHzYvxJVKk

Today we've released the first complete narrative of the Trump Administration’s inhumane family separation policy.  Our investigation reveals a policy marked by chaos reckless incompetence & intentional cruelty.  Full report ⤵️ https://t.co/vUGGVBfqjN
I hope the President & First Lady have a swift & complete recovery.   It’s a reminder to everyone to wear a mask wash your hands social distance & take COVID-19 seriously.

Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg was a personal hero to many women myself included. She defended equality freedom & justice until the end. I never could have broken any glass ceilings without her paving the way. I am heartbroken & forever grateful. #RestInPower

Thanks @jacobmward for hosting the small business discussion & thanks to all participants for joining.  While our CA small businesses are facing new challenges I am certain we will work together to overcome obstacles during the pandemic & beyond. https://t.co/abL4cWJyup
Santa Clara County neighbors: I hope you’re able to join the employment conversation tonight. https://t.co/tDeM8unhwT
As @HouseDemocrats continue to fight against efforts to degrade to the Postal Service here are some helpful alternative tips from @CBSNews.  https://t.co/lPE8RMoXJs
I've posted a list of USPS-related bills I support & am sharing stories about why the Postal Service matters to our neighbors in Santa Clara County.  📬 https://t.co/x2hDzN3Oaa 📬

The Postal Service is a pillar of our democracy enshrined in the Constitution & essential for providing critical services to millions of Americans: delivering prescriptions Social Security checks paychecks tax returns & absentee ballots.  We must protect the Postal Service. https://t.co/uNp0gcueax

Under what authority can intrusive surveillance tools be used on Americans while they’re peacefully exercising their first amendment rights?  (I did not receive a real answer from AG Barr.) https://t.co/gaaSv6FdUl

I specifically referred to reports the President deployed fed agents over the objections of local & state governments to generate real images of disorder for campaign ads to replace the fake images he uses now.  Example of Trump political ad ⤵️  https://t.co/GrEz88wd5c

During our @HouseJudiciary hearing I asked AG Barr about the surveillance of protests in Portland & around the country.   The constitutional rights of demonstrators should never be violated. (THREAD 1/3) https://t.co/lXkl80YsMS

ICYMI - we reminded the Trump Admin that refusal to carry out SCOTUS' DACA directive is an illegal usurpation of authority in violation of the separation of powers.   @HouseJudiciary ⤵️   https://t.co/wP2SdPA7WK

It's upsetting to see the defacing of the KZV School & Armenian Community Center in the Bay Area. I strongly denounce this hate-fueled vandalism.   Bigotry & hate threaten to undo the promises of equality inclusion & opportunity that are core American values.
We're demanding answers about the deployment of unidentified federal law enforcement personnel in Portland.   More ➡️ https://t.co/JXntIvlTpX https://t.co/gAQiypyB4c

The President is unlawfully trying change the #Census count through executive fiat.   Unfortunately the Administration's anti-immigrant zeal & desire to divide us as a nation knows no bounds.   @HouseJudiciary https://t.co/Cy7bz4Ng1U

I am so sad by the passing of John Lewis. He spent his life fighting for justice. In Congress he was a leader for what was good. I will miss his kindness his good humor his friendship & his moral compass. https://t.co/7rPAlMlR6x

Officers must be protecting & serving the American people not using militaristic might against peaceful protesters.  Congress needs answers from @DHSgov Sec. Wolf & the president who took an oath to protect & defend the Constitution.

These reports are concerning.  People are already contacting me expressing worry that this is like a repressive lawless regime not a democratic republic operating under the rule of law.  https://t.co/9L8G6ipARR

Adriana's story is an important one to pay attention to.  The #HeroesAct would correct this injustice by making sure these Americans do not get left out of our recovery.  Info about the House-passed bill including immigration provisions: https://t.co/9kICxt2M1O https://t.co/55SuGCsOng
📢 Reminder 📢  You can become a citizen co-sponsor at https://t.co/SApGi30bfd https://t.co/xREPRIp1Au

Proud to announce this #COVID19 funding for local tech company @Luminostics.  It is hoped that this project can help keep our healthcare workers safe provide relief for cash-strapped local governments & provide convenience & assurance for families. https://t.co/ud3mXGeNGB

.@HouseDemocrats will vote today on the George Floyd #JusticeInPolicing Act.  Looking for ways to get involved in police reform efforts? You can now become a citizen co-sponsor at https://t.co/SApGi30bfd

I was working for a @HouseJudiciary Committee Member during Watergate. In my view this political interference is far worse than Watergate.  Attorney General Barr's actions are deeply disturbing & the damage is hard to calculate.
ICYMI: I asked about political influence at @TheJusticeDept that impacts the integrity of our elections & a bogus CA emissions investigation during today's hearing.  https://t.co/SYXWCJ1uG0

With his latest Exec Order limiting immigration to the U.S. the President is once again abusing the law in an attempt to distract the American public from his abject failure to combat COVID-19.  Reminder to the Trump Admin: Congress writes the laws  https://t.co/U53QB4OkbV

Today on #Juneteenth we commemorate the end of slavery in the U.S.   155 years ago the last the last forcibly enslaved Americans were freed but Black Americans still face systemic racism & oppression.   The fight for justice & equality CONTINUES.   #BlackLivesMatter https://t.co/q1TvVJenMk
#DREAMers are here to stay because their #HomeIsHere.  Pass it on. https://t.co/MSov1vYD9q

This is a wonderful day for young Americans across this country. Today’s Supreme Court decision on DACA is not only a win for hundreds of thousands of DACA recipients it is a win for the rule of law.   Full statement: https://t.co/0TAJ7X5NXH https://t.co/Yo1eFKWVnN

Today's @HouseJudiciary markup will address the reforms needed to hold police accountable fight systemic racism & save lives. Watch: https://t.co/mBADi91Dz7  We can & must re-imagine what just policing looks like in our country. #JusticeInPolicing https://t.co/slDCk6N9pk

Last year I chaired a hearing on @CBP’s failure to care for children & asylum seekers in custody.  Today a full DHS IG report confirms that facilities are unsanitary & dangerous. ⤵️ It’s a disgrace.  https://t.co/8tIALPc2RF
This is a great legal victory for freedom & equality! https://t.co/AyX9XcWLV3

The following communities are currently undercounted in the #2020Census: -Black -Hispanic -Asian & Pacific Islander -Native American -Immigrants particularly in large cities  There are many resources to help you get counted including language support.  https://t.co/JTLiyl4MaW
Today is #AAPI Census Day.   Don't miss your chance to help our community access resources for hospitals schools roads & more.  https://t.co/EaTNyxmXkM
ICYMI: I spoke on @KCBSRadio about systematic racism in law enforcement & how the #JusticeInPolicing Act will help take our country in the right direction.  📻Listen here: https://t.co/SdedpE3RtC

📻I'll be speaking about the @HouseJudiciary racial justice hearing on @KCBSRadio during the 1pmPT hour today.  Recently many eyes have been opened to how Black Americans have been mistreated by law enforcement. Now we need to enact the #JusticeInPolicingAct.  #BlackLivesMatter

It's been a transformational few weeks since the murder of George Floyd. I'm grateful to those marching peacefully & grateful to be a part of #JusticeInPolicing efforts.   #BlackLivesMatter  Video of my Q&A during the @HouseJudiciary hearing today ⤵️ https://t.co/8CvCDur0RN

From George Floyd to Eric Garner to Breonna Taylor & too many others the list of unarmed POC who've been killed by law enforcement officers is long & outrageous.  Action is long overdue.  Led by @TheBlackCaucus @HouseDemocrats are fighting for #JusticeInPolicing. https://t.co/VKH2AsjM0G

The fight against racism & for equal justice under law should unite all Americans. It must not be used as a wedge to undercut our constitutional system of government.   The statement made by General Mattis addresses this: https://t.co/AEjbNf2Daq

I will soon observe the 8min 46sec moment of silence in honor of #GeorgeFloyd on this #NationalDayOfMourning.  Today we pause to remember & celebrate his life.  Next we turn our focus to securing progress & justice for him & all Black Americans.

As a member of @HouseJudiciary I'm working w/HJC colleagues & @TheBlackCaucus to examine & identify comprehensive legislation to address the crisis of racial profiling excessive force by law enforcement & the lost trust between police departments & the communities they serve.

It's obvious that living while Black in America shouldn't include being subjected to racial profiling by police brutality or any other violation of human rights.   As I keep listening to peers & constituents I'm finding strength from your input.  #GeorgeFloyd #BlackLivesMatter
Do you have specific questions about the #HeroesAct?  The latest #COVID19 update on my website includes topic-by-topic resources on the House-passed bill.  https://t.co/9kICxt2M1O

WATCH LIVE NOW  We're holding a @HouseJudiciary virtual roundtable on the Trump Admin's mishandling of the immigration detention system in the face of the deadly #COVID19 pandemic.  Sadly @ICEgov's actions have endangered lives in the U.S. & abroad.  https://t.co/R2pSi5tLqY

On #CesarChavezDay we honor the legacy of an inspirational leader who dedicated himself to workers in San Jose & around the country.  During these trying times we must support those who feed our nation. Let's do all we can to ensure farmworkers stay safe & healthy.

Executive privilege cannot be used to prevent a witness who is willing to testify from appearing and certainly not one who no longer works in government. It’s not a gag order. And witnesses testify on national security all the time.  Bolton has a right to testify if he wants to. https://t.co/4FtvPDgtDl
